saving.saveFailMessage: There was a problem when trying to save your results. We hope you don't mind, but could you send the text below to EMAILADDRESS. For your convenience, this text has been copied to your clipboard. Are you a Mechanical Turker? Make sure to close this window when done to retrieve your code. Thanks.
saving.saveSuccessMessage: <font size= '20'><b>Successfully saved your data. You can close this message-window. Thankyou.<font size= '15'>
